data.fullContent: The winery in France was a gorgeous sight. The root of grape vine stretched towards the sea, and old growth oak trees shaded the land in front of the tasting room. Bees buzzed between the roses planted along the driveway. At night a thick fog descended on the valley, and mist floated through the air.
data.answer: 法国的酿酒厂是一幅美丽的景象。葡萄藤的根伸向大海，老橡树在品酒室前的土地上遮阴。蜜蜂在沿着车道种植的玫瑰之间嗡嗡地飞来飞去。夜晚，浓雾笼罩着山谷，薄雾在空中飘浮。
